title: The "Add Me - I'm Looking to Play" List
body:
Hey everyone, 

As someone always looking for new people to play with, I thought it would be great to have a list of other summoners who are always looking to expand their friend's list so you don't have to play alone if you don't want to! I will keep this updated frequently. 

Any League'rs who Twitter, follow me: @aDrunkLlama - I'll follow back.


**Comment below with your Summoner Name & Rank & Modes you are playing / looking for others:**



_**Normals**_

replies.body: Hey so you left a comment on my post and I just wanted to let you know that I made some adjustments based on your feedback and that the page is new because apparently it got posted in the wrong section so it got taken down but its back up and modified. So if you want to come back and check it out again I would be really thankful. Also I'm not sure if you got the reply but I would like to know if you would be interested in helping me to create a new passive to fit better than what I have now because I totally agree with what you said about it. :)
i would join  but i am eu server sadly

I'm looking for normal or Rank
